metadata.dc:author: López de Cayaffa, C
Flores de Rodríguez, M
metadata.dc:description: Review of available literature reveals the lack of reports on memory impairment in relation to visuo-spatial and tridimensional dominance. Considering the absence of specific methods for assaying evaluations, the intention of our study was to devise a systematic testing procedure in order to explore the patterns referrable to this aspect.
metadata.dc:title: Prueba de evaluación de la memoria visuo-espacial.
[A test for the evaluation of visuo-spatial memory].
